title: Extended Sans-serif font to identify
content:
Hello,

Please help me to identify this one:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055659im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4684.png)

Greets,  
AL

Font: 

 Helvetica Neue LT Extended Heavy 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055659/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055659/http:/typophile.com/files/font_82.png) | 20.87 KB |
author: alpar

comments.content: Very generic, nothing specific, could be many sans so, without too much thinking, I'd say [Helvetica Neue LT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055659/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica) Extended Heavy/Black squooshed.
